content.detailedDescription: The ufo was bright, moved around in different ways in the sky.  i called 2 others to come and see and we all watched as it moved around and than it took off and disappeared.
content.summary: Bright ufo in the sky at stoney creek, on

content.detailedDescription:
While flying from asia to boston (korean airlines), business class, window seat.  i woke up flying some where between south korea and the aleusian islands flying at about 35,000 feet about 30% into my flight.  looking out the window looking northward at what i thought was another aircraft northwest of us it appeared to be moving faster than the plane i was in.  suddenly, there were three then six glowing objects appearing to fly in formation.  then some of the objects would go in different directions both up, down, forward and reverse.  very strange,  i pulled out my cell phone and tried to do a video and the cell phone kept quitting.  i did manage to get one real short one attached.  there were 11 objects in total.  they would come and go and even disappear then come back again.   i switched to camera and then got nothing as they all disappeared.  i watched for a little while longer and then saw them again, only this time there were 5.  then my phone went dead.  they were farther away but brighter and then vanished.  they were gone for good.  i have been showing them around and someone suggested i send them to you.  i did not tell anyone nor did i hear any talk of this during or after my flight.
also strange but even when they flew information there was always two objects outside the formation moving around, almost like heading.  
thank you,


this is not the first incident i have had, as many years ago i had a very different experience and i sent in a report dating back to 1970 which was investigated by the air force.
content.summary: Multiple glowing circles flying in formation

content.detailedDescription:
On friday, august 14, 2015 at approximately 9:30pm atl there were four of us outside relaxing after the day. the first one to witness it saw it about nw and said "wow look how bright that plane is!". the other 3 of us looked and said "that isn't a plane, there are no lights".
it was about the size of a planet, and extremely bright, brighter than the stars. it was a clear night and the sky was wide open. it was a lot larger than the stars and appeared to be flying at the same altitude that a plane would, but maybe lower. we weren't frightened, more excited, likely because of its distance. 
as it came overhead, we noticed a second identical light coming south to north. they crossed paths directly above our heads, and the second one we had seen disappeared. 
we resumed watching the first one that began to "bounce" and change directions. it was going a steady speed until it started bouncing, it slowed down and started hovering. it bounced again then continued ne where it started flashing off (so it appeared to be gone) then back on again. 
finally it turned a deep crimson red colour, and just vanished. 
a few minutes later smaller planes and helicopters appeared to be travelling in the direction we last saw it.
content.summary: Bright planet like ufos cross, one disappears, other turns red

content.detailedDescription:
1- watering the plants outside and looking at the sunset
2- we look at the sunset every night, and noticed a black dot moving in the sky very slowly, slower than a bird or plane
3- we could see what it wasn't: a bird, a kite, a drone, it was way to high for that. we saw a black dot and didn't know what it was
4- the object was a dot, it could have been a disc or sphere the only thing we could see was a black dot with an aura of white light around it. it was moving very slowly. the sky had very high clouds that night. and the dot was underneath the clouds, moving from east to west at some point after being observed for about 15 mn it change direction for south west 
5- at first i thought my retina was playing with me but my husband was able to see the dot too. so we realized that we were looking at something that we could not explain. we were curious of learning what it was and talk about it all evening, and thinking that we should file a report, which we are doing today 
6- the object went up and disappeared behind a cloud, heading south-west from where we were stnding
content.summary: A black dot seen in the sky at sunset east going west then changed direction for south, once observed, see by 2 witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen something in edmonton ab canada where i live i even have pics of it it stayed for 3hrs over the same spot and when i zoomed in i was shocked what i seen this was ,ials above the building must have been 40 to 60 miles in the sky it was a clear night and i took it with a cybershot cam from sony with a 250x zoom im a storm chaser i don't know what to tell you be cause when i zoomed in with the computer i didn't know what to think in two of them you can see sides of building so you have a idea of what im saying zoom in like i did and you will be shocked like i said we just came back from a storm chase we were opening the apt door and looked up and seen it so we took pics i just thought it was a meteor hitting the atmosphere was i wrong any way it shot up and never seen it again three days later for men came to my door and they dint act like human dressed in black glasses they said they worked for csis and top level government of canada they dint show me id of use names just regarded themselves by numbers and said if i told anybody they would be back they can kiss my but 
believe me or not i don't care i know who i am what i seen so injoy the pics
content.summary: Just came home from a storm chase as i was opening the door we looked up and seen it

content.detailedDescription: On both sunday and monday mornings from 1 a.M. for 45-60 minutes i observed flashing lights of blue/green, white and red while hovering about 1,000 ft up in the northeast sky over springfield/eugene or.  i checked with local police to ascertain if a helicopter was in that area.  i was told "no" by dispatch unless it was private or military.  it didnt behave like police helicopters i have witnessed in large cities.  also it didnt shine a searchlight.  after 60 minutes, it is still hovering in place.  thinking back, i have seen it before this summer, but being tired, i dismissed it as a planet even though i realize that no planets flash multi colored lights even if they seem to twinkle (such as venus). this is my 4th sighting of ufos, the 3rd this year.  i viewed this from a high rise building looking northeast and using a simple pair of binoculars.
content.summary: At 1 a.M. on both sunday and monday mornings i observed something flashing 3-4 colors hovering over 45 minutes at approx 1,000 ft up

content.detailedDescription:
My father was sitting in our garden when he say the event take place and immediately called me to watch. when i arrived outside i could see around 4 large circular beams of lights passing over the clouds in the sky. it was 9:30pm in london, the sky was black and there were light clouds that the lights 'reflected' on to. instantly i got my phone out to record the event however, the darkness and lack of camera quality showed barely nothing however, i do believe more could be seen if the videos exposure was increased. 
myself and family members tried to come up with an explanation of what this could be ie festival lights, lasers etc. however, none were veasable as there was no noise or light source that would occur from a laser being pointed up. i considered the fact that it was vj day however no planes were in sight and the event had finished hours before and had not taken place near the site of occurrence. 
the 4 lights were moving around in no particular order and would then join back up together. after dissapearing for a couple of minutes they came shooting back, over the top of my house and repeated the movements across the sky. after a while they gradually dissapeared and i went back inside. although i found this incident very strange and unusual, i was also extremely intrigued by what this could be and excited at the same time to be able to witness this. i initially wondered could it be to do with the government or was it a real ufo. 
once i went back inside i immediately checked my phone and twitter to search up and see if anyone else had witnessed this too. i found that people had also seen it in other parts of the uk such as kent and southampton which i found even more intriguing as it was a much broader area. throughout the night and early hours of the morning people had still been witnessing the lights and tweeting about it which shows that it lasted for a long amount of time.
content.summary: Roughly 4 large circular beams of light appeared in the sky moving with varied directional change.

content.detailedDescription: My sister, best friend and i were babysitting for a neighbor just a few houses down from where we lived so this neighbor could go to our mom and dads halloween party that night. my dad was a naval chief for the u.S. military and we were living in concord california in base housing. there was a very large naval weapons station with multiple underground bunkers into the hills right behind our home. it was around 10pm the night of october 30th 1994. i was 12 years old and my sister was 13 at the time. we were not supposed to be smoking nor was my best friend supposed to be there but the 3 of us went out front to sneak us a cigarette and when we walked outside we saw the biggest aircraft i have ever seen hovering over us not more then probably 20 feet or less right above our heads. it was very large, round, metallic looking, small windows all around it, big red light right in the center with yellow, green, blue and red lights pulsating very brightly all around it. it was very large in size. 3 to 400 feet wide or more. it didn't make a sound. we all just stood there ... we didn't even breath out of shock as to what our eye balls were even seeing. the silence seemed to last forever!! it couldn't have been longer then a minute or two of us just staring at this thing. we were so terrified we didn't dare even make a sound or take a breath. then suddenly this very loud pitch beeping sound came into my ears ... like a dog whistle if i was to try and compare the sound to something familiar. i was the first one to start running as fast as i could into the house. the sound it gave off really made me wake up to what it was that was actually going on. i was terrified and ran. my sister and friend stayed out there and watched it shoot off very fast into the night. again she said the thing didn't even make a sound when it took off. honestly.... i don't really remember much after that except we called our parents in a frenzy and they did not believe us. glad to say that they do now😀. anyways.... thank you for reading my story and actually giving me a place to be able to share it. this sighting so long ago has really changed my life and the person i probably would not be today had i not experienced something so traumatic as that. i'll never forget it and am just very great up i was not alone that night. i do not think i would have even believed it myself had i not had my sister and friend there to tell me they seen it too! craziest thing to date i have ever seen. thanks for allowing me to share.
content.summary: Lived in base housing. dad was a naval chief for the u.S. military. sister, bf and i were babysitting for a neighbor. stepped out front and saw the biggest aircraft i have ever seen. it was huge and has changed my life ever since.

content.detailedDescription:
My father was sitting in our garden when he say the event take place and immediately called me to watch. when i arrived outside i could see around 4 large circular beams of lights passing over the clouds in the sky. it was 9:30pm in london, the sky was black and there were light clouds that the lights 'reflected' on to. instantly i got my phone out to record the event however, the darkness and lack of camera quality showed barely nothing however, i do believe more could be seen if the videos exposure was increased. 
myself and family members tried to come up with an explanation of what this could be ie festival lights, lasers etc. however, none were veasable as there was no noise or light source that would occur from a laser being pointed up. i considered the fact that it was vj day however no planes were in sight and the event had finished hours before and had not taken place near the site of occurrence. 
the 4 lights were moving around in no particular order and would then join back up together. after dissapearing for a couple of minutes they came shooting back, over the top of my house and repeated the movements across the sky. after a while they gradually dissapeared and i went back inside. although i found this incident very strange and unusual, i was also extremely intrigued by what this could be and excited at the same time to be able to witness this. i initially wondered could it be to do with the government or was it a real ufo. 
once i went back inside i immediately checked my phone and twitter to search up and see if anyone else had witnessed this too. i found that people had also seen it in other parts of the uk such as kent and southampton which i found even more intriguing as it was a much broader area. throughout the night and early hours of the morning people had still been witnessing the lights and tweeting about it which shows that it lasted for a long amount of time.
content.summary: Roughly 4 large circular beams of light appeared moving over the sky/clouds with varied directional changes.

content.detailedDescription:
1. driving, north street
2. flashing lights
3. plane
4. hovered and moved in a weird way and flashed different colours. looked like a triangle, stayed in same general area. look like they kept splitting up.
5. shock.. drove closer to it
6. flashed white and then disappeared
content.summary: Pulsating lights that appeared to form triangles, all different colours, moved in an odd way

content.detailedDescription:
I was asleep before i heard my brother drive in from work. i looked at my phone to see what time it was and saw it was 11:17pm. my brother came in and turned on a light in the next room that reflected off my window. staring at the window i saw a flash of light toward the east in the direction of the sangre de cristo mountains. at this point my brother had gone outside to retrieve something he left in his truck. the light is still on in the next room when my brother returns and dims the light. my bed faces my bedroom window and with less light reflecting off its surface, i noticed a glowing distortion in the sky that appeared to be wavering in place. i thought i was seeing the after effects of my eyes adjusting to the dark after seeing the light in the next room.

curious. i continued to stare out the window from my bed and noted the same wavering light(s). i glanced right, staring at the wall to see if my vision was responsible for seeing the light in the sky. seeing nothing i stared out the window and saw that the lights really were wavering in the sky, appearing to be relatively stationary with the exception of the wavering behavior that made the light(s) look as if they weren't quite staying in one place, but given the distance (i would say several miles) it may be that they were rapidly moving closely about each  other. i thought i was seeing a satillite but the light(s) wavering in place did not reflect a defined path across the sky.  meanwhile periodic flashes could be seen  (as you see with lightening in the night sky) to the east. 

my brother confirmed that he ale could  see the lights and their odd behavior and noted the flashes of light when he was outside but didn't see any lightning bolts in that direction. i i is difficult to determine how distant the lights were. i cannot say they were of any particular shape, but appeared to be wavering stars flickering and giving the appearance of moving about each other in a set place in the sky. the flash of light to the east would appear now and then but ceased minutes later as we continued to stare at the lights.

i do admit feeling some fear and trepidation once i realized there might not be a mundane explanation for the flickering and slightly moving starlike object(s). my brother and i watched the lights for nearly 40 minutes. in this time frame the light(s) slowly gained altitude and would slowly descend ever so slightly, wavering and flickering in the sky. the light(s) were brighter than the stars in the night sky, the given appearance of s group of lights wavering about each other excludes venus as a possible explanation.

despite feeling afraid and constantly noting the time, my brother and i looked away from the window for a moment and looked back at the sky. the lights were gone. it was 12:05 august 17th. during the sighting the lights were too far away to capture on film and this narrative will have to do.

now it's nearly 1am. it's likely my brother and i will remain awake for the better part of the night.
content.summary: Hovering group of star like objects that appeared to move slightly around each other producing a distortion effect

content.altitude: Landed, Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription: it is my 19th birth-day,i am not married, and i have no kids. i want a child to carry-on after me. my prayers were not answered so i prayed to the ufo. thought it out over a little un-none laugh and fell asleep. when i awoke  i was laying on my back looking at a female ufo being. she was just getting off of me while closing the front of her robe then i turned my head to see in a glass room an older male ufo being standing by what i guessed was a controller of my condition and i said to them in realm of what i had prayed before, why didn't you do this while i was awake^, we could have had some fun. then he spoke back to me , saying don't tell any one you saw this.  i woke up in my car parked half way into a ditch 7 miles south a town where past ufo sightings too have been seen so hear say. at 439 am. i whent to sleep at 9am. i am leaving out details because he asked me to and she was cute but i still have no kids but that is another unexplainable story that really happened
content.summary: I prayed for unanswered hopes too ufos. i woke-up,they had just tryed to answer my dreams. i was told not to tell anyone.

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of aug. 13th, though possibly the 12th or 14th, at 10:15 pm a friend and i stepped out to take a walk. she, of a very scientific mind, noticed a bright white light in the cloudless northern sky. the light seemed to be much lower than the altitude airliners fly, or even small planes. i thought maybe it was a head light of a big plane because it was so bright and big, but it stayed consistently bright as it traveled from the northern sky to the eastern/southern-ish. there were no wing lights, red or blue, of normal planes. i heard no engine noise, but couldn't tell if that was normal or not since it's height and size were unusual. i was curious about it's slow speed, thought it possible to be a helicopter, but heard no "chopper" sounds as i would expect. it seems like it took about two minutes to cross the sky, ever as bright as we first saw it, when it was east of us, standing beneath the cloudless sky, the white light slowly, slowly faded to black revealing one much smaller constant red light that seemed to have perhaps been on the whole time, but again, no flashing, no lights of any other color, and this red light after only say ten seconds, faded to black which only took two or three seconds. this seemed very inordinate, to go dark in the sky. it's not just that this is a safety hazard, but where the craft was when it 'disappeared' was not in place with where it should have been if the red light had just faded out of view from traveling away from us. 
to me it felt man-made and controlled, but whatever, it was not flying properly identifiable as far as we, untrained civilians are able to say.
content.summary: Pure white light, no blinking red or blue, slowly traveled e/se without fading in brightness, faded to a red light, disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: When i am going to my room via stair case i seen a reddish planet like object and i called my wife and mom to show that but it was moving very fast with constant light which is reddish later after passing through a cloud it was grey circular and continued to move towards north and it vanished from our sight. we are wondering on it and sure it is not a flight as the light will blink and sound will come mostly but we don't know what it is may be a burning satellite or an ufo? no news was in papers or tv. as it is very high in height it was not able to capture in my mobile camera. but sure it was burning and moved fastly
content.summary: Flame like moving object

content.detailedDescription: At aprox. 9:54pm, i observed a very intense, white light quickly traveling from north west to south east. light was solid and brighter than any airplane light. half-way across the sky, object rotated straight up, exposing rear red light. object then accelrated and appeared to leave the atmosphere.
content.summary: Intense, bright light traveled across sky and ascended rapidly out of atomosphere

content.detailedDescription:
Saturday, august 15, 2015 - aproximately 09:44pm

while over at a neighbor's party, myself, my neighbor, and at least one of his guests observed a commercial aircraft flying from west-northwest to east-southeast.

as we watched, a solid white light (which we at first assumed to be a satellite) lit up, moving in the exact same direction as and roughly 1-2 miles directly behind the commercial aircraft.

as one of the guests attempted to record it, the light began to dim - yet several seconds before disappearing completely i witnessed it come to a complete stop!

unknown if guest managed to succeed in recording object.

and no - i had not been drinking.
content.summary: Solid white light follows behind aircraft-comes to stop before fading out

content.detailedDescription: On the evening of aug. 14. 2015, i was on my 2nd story rear deck. watching the skies for the perseid meteor showers. at around 10:00pm, i saw a bright object traveling from my nw direction to my ne direction. i saw no visible aircraft lights so i grabbed my binoculars & focused on the moving object. still i saw no visible blinking lights, just a bright white light. as it got to my north direction, it seemed to change color to an orange/reddish color, the it shot up vertically in a nne direction. i stayed focused on it but it was gone, faded from sight in about 1 to 1.5 seconds. it was incredible how fast it accelerated vertically. i immediately went inside to tell my wife who was watching tv what i had witnessed. it was way better than any of the meteor streaks i witnessed in the few nights i was out watching the sky. i felt i had to make an official report of that sighting.
content.summary: Saw with binoculars a starlike object moving from nw to ne direction with no visible aircraft lights change color & go vertical out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
1. received picture
2. noticed that there was a strange dark object in the sky
3. a dark spot on the picture
4. unknown received picture
5. that it was strange
6. unknown
content.summary: Photo sent to phone. noticed object after viewing.

content.detailedDescription: I was at work it was fairly late around 11pm. i was walking with a co-worker toward a tent we have set up beside our ball field.We were just chatting when we saw this blueish light in the the sky across the ball field but it looked like it was a few km away. so we stood there trying to figure out what it was then all of a sudden it started to get bigger and closer. it took about 3 secs to get right in front of us about 10 feet away and it was huge.Had to be close to 25-30 ft across. and it had a almost orangey red glow to the surface and was emitting a fuzzy static noise. it only hung there for about 5 secs then took off southwest over a small mountain beside my work.It was incredible. but soon after i started to feel ill and dizzy and started vomiting.And since then i keep having visions of inside a ship.But i've never in my life been inside any kind of ship.
content.summary: Huge disk appears in front of me then takes off.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
President obama had literally just gave election speech in '08. my buddy and i were at my parents house i grew up at, walked out to have a smoke talking about new president. just looking up to the sky as normal, saw 2 lights moving really slow from the east, which would be from danville, ky moving towards the west slowly. we talked about the lights and i thought/said its probably a plane or helicopter and i said "there will be a noise in a sec after it passes". the lights stopped and hovered literally right over the neighbors house > 40 ft away. it hovered for around 30 secs or so and we were just looking at it and back at each other knowing we were both seeing the same thing. then one time we looked at each other and back up and it was gone. looked to the west and it had moved literally/exactly 10 miles west over perryville, ky.  

 i cannot speak for this but my friends say they it again and followed it doing the exact same thing exactly one week later. 4 men told me this, they have no reason to lie, but i did not personally see it again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 lights, slow move in, hover, fast move out e-w central ky

content.detailedDescription:
I am a 60 year old man. i live in palm desert, ca. and had taken a weekend trip to san diego, friday, june 5th to sunday, june 7th. i was visiting alone staying at travel lodge in mission valley. on my final evening, june 7th, i drove out to pacific beach for dinner. i was on the boardwalk that runs from crystal pier in pacific beach southward to mission beach. before dinner at a beachfront restaurant, (joe's crab shack) which i mention only to offer a better locale for investigating, i was taking a few pictures with my samsung s6 phone of the beach, boardwalk, etc. i was waiting for sunset before dining. 

at sunset i noticed an object in the sky above the pier area that glinted a bit seemed mostly "dull" and seemed to be "embedded" in the clouds. at first i thought it was a bird perhaps or a plane. but it didn't move for nearly a minute while i observed it. i didn't give it much thought. i wasn't thinking about ufos or birds or planes. i was just taking pictures. i was thinking about dinner. i snapped a few pictures. a minute or so later i looked back up in the same area of the sky and it was gone. i went to dinner.

when i had returned home monday, june 8th, i transferred the weekend pictures to my home pc. i like to review pictures i've taken and zoom in and out on them just to look at people and scenery just to see how things look enlarged. i've done this for years. when i came across the pacific beach sunset pictures i recalled the sight i had seen. so i zoomed in on it and i can't explain what it could be. the object, which had seemed stationary in the sky at sunset and then had just vanished within a minute's time appears to be a rectangular object that is either reflecting light or emitting it. i just thought it was strange because it never moved. it was just there for a moment or two and then gone.

i am attaching 3 images.
image 1 is the original.
image 2 has a red pointer to the object that i placed there with microsoft image composer to identify the object.
image 3 is a cropped out area of the original photo with 500% magnification.

i am so curious as to what this object could be. i've felt at odds over discovering this image. my mind just keeps going back to it over and over again.

thanks for your interest and taking a look at these images.

i would love to hear anything from anyone about what it might be.

thank you,
kenneth lucini
content.summary: Ufo hovering in air above ocean near the crystal pier in pacific beach

content.detailedDescription: There were eight of us at the lake saint catherine campsite in poultney vermont.  on wednesday, august 12, 2015, at about 10:30 p.M. we went to the water to look for a possible meteor shower.  we were scanning the sky when suddenly we observed an orange light streak across the sky.  it was a big object flying low about 500 to 1000 feet.  it changed direction then stopped right in front of us.  it hovered there. then started to dim out.  as it dimmed i could see a globe shaped greyish object until it completely dimmed out.  a second object then appeared streaking across the sky at about the same altitude.  it also stopped in the same place, hovered and dimmed out.  another object did the same thing but changed direction a few times.  this object got closer to us.  we were near the waters edge.  this too dimmed out.  the fourth object did the same thing and was closer.  the fifth object got very close.  we were yelling for everyone to take cover in a copse of trees.  we knelt down in the trees and waited for this last light to dim out.  when it did we ran back to our camp cite.  i was very afraid, the others were too.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed orange reddish yellow lights come from the east over our campground.  we saw about five in all.  they came very close we hid in the trees in the end and then fled to our campsite.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking a picture of a small bird and when i went inside my house to show my wife,she asked me what the object was and i was very surprised to have taken a picture of a ufo in the picture. everyone that i showed it to said i need to report it but i thought they might think i`m nuts. but i have a nice picture of the craft on my telephone. i has to be at least as big as a fighter jet or larger.
content.summary: Shocking to get picture of the craft

content.detailedDescription: Was out on my balcony looking up at the new batch of chem-trails when i noticed out of the south west an object i took to be a plane at first. i continued to observe as it came closer. when it was above i noticed it had what appeared to be multiple wings and it left no trail or made any sound. i came in and told my roommate what i had seen and noted the time, i then contacted this sight and left this report. maybe it was just an experimental plane, have no idea but felt a record would be good in case someone else has seen it too.
content.summary: Seen what i thought was a plane coming from the south west, as it got closer it didn't look so much like a regular plane and slightly bigger than a passenger jet with what appeared to be multi-winged, it made no sound at all.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to have a smoke and decided to have a look in the sky as i see these objects everynight and in different towns. there is a cemetery very close to my home and very little light giving me a great view of the sky.I was looking for less than 5 minutes when i saw the first one it was white and very bright it moved south and quickly dissapeared. less than 2 or 3 minutes later another one white like a star was moving west and seemed to get a bit brighter as i observed it i watched it for about a minute and tried to film it but the resolution on my phones camera would not pick it up.It just faded away as they always do. i have seen these objects countless times and would love to get more info as to what they might be. we just had a meteor shower the last 3 days in a row i was actually hoping to see a meteor and i share that because these are nothing like a meteor no trail or smoke or sound or anything.I must state for the record the sheer number of these that i personally have seen leads me to believe that many many other people have seen them as well. in fact if your in the north east of the u.S. go out at night 8-10 pm seems to be best and have a look id be willing to bet  you see for yourself!
content.summary: Looked like a star moving in a straight line

content.detailedDescription: It was july 16 around 3 to 4pm, i was preparing the bbq and it was a clear has day and i seen a single little cloud in the sky so i was observing the cloud for about 1 minute and suddenly the cloud was shaping has a cone for about 20 to 30 seconds and a blue light flashes out through the tip of the cone and flies up in a second into space. after the blue light takes off from the cone shaped cloud the cloud vanishes away... its not the first time i witness ufo events..
content.summary: Single cloud shapes up to a cone and a blue light fashes out of the cone and takes off  in space

content.detailedDescription: In my driveway exiting car seen bright orange red light looked at it long enough to realize it was like nothing ive ever seen  though maybe shooting star seen plenty out on the lake this was not object was acorn like soild color moving very fast had time to get pix but not on a smart phone but on the phone you can clearly see a strange object felt verry excited and a adrenalin rush almost speechless lost sight in tree line      do not have ability to send photos  looked it in my phone and iam afaid to lose it is there any way to have someone look at my phone ?  tried taking  pix from my phone with daughters phone mine is much clearer and can zoom in better
content.summary: Geting out of car got my attention out of the corner of my eye long enough to get pix very familiar with alkind of air craft never seen anything like thatin

content.detailedDescription: On august 10th my father and i were sitting on his back porch looking at the stars and talking, when i looked directly above, a 90 degree angle, and saw a bright light about eraser come to a slow and then stop, i said to my father, look at that, he then looked and saw what i saw. the object moved left slowly, then right slowly. it was higher than what a plane or jet would be. it was pulsating and then it elevated, blending in with the stars. my father's neck began to hurt and he became bored of the situation. i stayed out watching it. i then watched it move from what was directly above my house to the south west side of my home. it moved very slowly. while i was looking at it, i heard, it is going to change its brightness, or pulse. i heard this as if it was directed to me. this entire incident was over about a 2 hour period.
content.summary: Bright light comes to a slow stop at about 45,000 feet or higher, then elevates, moves to left slowly then to right, then stationary until later

content.detailedDescription: Je mangeais sur une terrasse de la rue st-denis, elle se situe aux troisième étage. je faisais face à la rue, je venais de payer l’addition et je me préparais à partir, j’ai alors lever les yeux pour regarder juste au dessus des édifices en face, juste au dessus du pont jacques-cartier, le ciel était complètement dégagé, 15:35 précisément, je venais de regarder l’heure sur mon cell. j’ai observer une boule d’un blanc éclatant qui était complètement immobile dans le ciel, j’étais intrigué, j’ai décidé d’observer plus longtemps, 5 minutes au total. je pensais que c’était des avions ou des hélicoptères, qui arrivaient ou qui s’éloignait, impossible, il n’y avait aucun changement de dimensions. environ 30 secondes après, j’ai vue apparaitre à la gauche de celle-ci, une deuxième sphère blanche, que j’évalue à 300 ou 400 pieds de l’autre, elle y resta environ 3 à 4 minutes, pour ensuite rejoindre la première en une fraction de seconde, pour ensuite disparaitre une seconde plus tard.
content.summary: White orbs

content.detailedDescription:
J'arrivais chez moi, a st-lin-laurentides, j'avais terminer de travailler. il ã©tait dans les environs de 2h30 et 3h00 du matin, le soleil ã©tait encore coucher et il faisait frais. je m'assis rarement sur mon balcon, mais aprã¨s une dure journã©e a conduire un autobus pour la ville et puisque il faisait frais je sentais le besoin d'aller m'assoir sur mon balcon et de regarder les ã©toiles. le temps de dã©compresser un peu pour pouvoir aller dormir. 
personnellement, j'aime beaucoup tout ce qui a trait a la science fiction et a la possibilitã© de la vie ailleurs dans l'univers. alors, tout en regardant les ã©toiles je dis simplement" si il y a de la vie intelligente ailleurs et qui nous observes pouvez vous me dire bonjour" et lã , il y a un ã©norme flash de lumiã¨re, comme si une ã©toile venait tout juste d'explosã©. surpris et content en mãªme temps de voir cette coincidence je me demande de quoi il s'agit. plus rien, tout est calme, ciel ã©toilã© et nuit tranquille. je pause une autre question" venez vous juste de me dire bonjours? un autre flash ã©norme de lumiã¨re blanche. et un troisiã¨me flash de lumiã¨re.
aprã¨s le troisiã¨me, je remarquais un objet de forme ovale ou comme un oeuf qui se dã©plaã§ais de gauche a droite et qui perdait de la luminositã© et avait maintenant une couleur sombre noir, orange, rouge. comme une bã»che de foyer, de la braise qui s'ã©teint. et je perdit l'objet de vue ã©tant devenue sombre noir comme la nuit.
les deux premiers flash ã©taient selon moi au mãªme endroit dans le ciel et le troisiã¨me un peu plus vers la droite. l'objet semblait se dã©placer trã¨s lentement.
je suis le premier a ãªtre surpris d'une tel coincidence et de croire que peut ãªtre , il y a autres choses ailleurs. sait quand mãªme la quatriã¨me fois que je vois ces lumiã¨re ou vaisseaux dans le ciel. mais sait la premiã¨re fois qu'il semble avoir un ã©change, un semblant de communication     
, coincidence ou non, j'ai quand mãªme bien dormi aprã¨s.
content.summary: Objet orange rouge de forme oeuf oval apprãªt avoir ã©tã© d'un ã©clat trã¨s brilliant
